connector.description:
Send Events to Azure Eventhubs.

The Kamelet is able to understand the following headers to be set:

- `partition` / `ce-partition`: as the time to live of the message in the queue.

If the header won't be set then the partition will be assigned by Eventhubs

camel.kamelet.azure-eventhubs-sink.share.name: camel.kamelet.azure-eventhubs-sink.sharedAccessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-eventhubs-sink.share.description: The key for EventHubs SAS key name
